sections.title: System Description
sections.txt_claim: Protopraxic Logic is a triune, modal, metaphysically grounded logic system that unifies identity, contradiction, and excluded middle under three interdependent hypostatic identities‚ÄîùïÄ‚ÇÅ, ùïÄ‚ÇÇ, ùïÄ‚ÇÉ‚Äîwithin a Necessary Being ùïÜ. It incorporates: Modal operators (‚ñ°, ‚óá), Custom PXL operators (‚ßü, ‚áé, ‚áå, ‚üπ, ‚àº, ‚âÄ, ‚´¥, ‚üº, ‚©™), Metaphysical grounding structured through triune coherence, S5 modal frame
sections.notes: High-level system description. Explanatory overview, not a formal claim.

sections.title: Symbol Key
sections.txt_claim: ‚ßü : Identity (self-coherence); ‚áé : Non-equivalence (exclusivity); ‚áå : Interchange (balance); ‚üπ : Implication (PXL conditional); ‚àº : Negation (non-coherence); ‚âÄ : Conflation (misalignment); ‚´¥ : Dichotomy (excluded middle); ‚üº : Grounded entailment; ‚©™ : Modal coherence equivalence (triune parallelism); ‚äó : S2 operator (axiom of choice / modal composition); ‚äï : Addition (arithmetic domain); ‚ñ° : Necessity (modal operator); ‚óá : Possibility (modal operator); ‚ä§ : Truth (verum); ‚ä• : Falsity (falsum)
sections.notes: Symbol notation key. Duplicate of content in pxl_foundations_normalized.json. Retained for completeness but authority=explanatory_only.

sections.title: A2 ‚Äî Law of Non-Contradiction
sections.txt_claim: ‚ñ°(‚àÄx y : Obj, ‚àº(x ‚ßü y ‚àß x ‚áé y)) ‚Äî Law of Non-Contradiction grounded in ùïÄ‚ÇÇ
sections.coq_definition: Axiom A2_noncontradiction : Box (forall x y, ~(Ident x y /\ NonEquiv x y)).
sections.notes: Irreducible axiom. One of 8 kernel axioms. Grounded in I2 (ùïÄ‚ÇÇ).

sections.title: A7 ‚Äî Triune Necessary Being
sections.txt_claim: ‚ñ°(coherence ùïÜ) ‚Äî Triune Necessary Being required for coherence in all possible worlds
sections.notes: Irreducible axiom. One of 8 kernel axioms. NB (ùïÜ) = Necessary Being.

sections.title: Bridging Principles (Cross-Reference)
sections.txt_claim: Modus Groundens, Triune Dependency Substitution, Privative Collapse, Grounding Yields Entailment, Coherence Lifts Entailment, Entails Global Implies Truth
sections.notes: These 6 bridging principles are axioms in pxl_kernel_axioms. Already extracted in pxl_foundations_normalized.json from PXL_Formal_Language_Definition.txt. Not duplicated here to avoid redundancy.

sections.title: A1 (Identity) ‚Äî ELIMINATED
sections.txt_claim: A1 (Identity): Proven from Leibniz definition + necessitation
sections.coq_definition: Lemma ax_ident_refl : forall x, Ident x x.
sections.notes: Was axiom in Phase 1/2, now proven as lemma. Eliminated via Leibniz definition of identity + modal necessitation.

sections.title: A3 (Excluded Middle) ‚Äî ELIMINATED
sections.txt_claim: A3 (Excluded Middle): Derivable in S5 frame from A2 + modal axioms
sections.coq_definition: Theorem pxl_excluded_middle : forall P : Prop, P \/ ~P.
sections.notes: Was axiom in Phase 1/2, now proven as theorem. Derived from A2_noncontradiction + S5 modal frame semantics.

sections.title: A4 (Distinct Instantiation) ‚Äî ELIMINATED
sections.txt_claim: A4 (Distinct Instantiation): Proven from identity properties
sections.notes: Was axiom in Phase 1/2, now eliminated. Proven from ax_ident_refl + identity properties. Exact lemma name may vary in code.

sections.title: A5 (Triune Structure) ‚Äî ELIMINATED
sections.txt_claim: A5 (Triune Structure): Implicit in domain definition
sections.notes: Was axiom in Phase 1/2, now eliminated. Structure implicit in Parameter declarations for I1, I2, I3, NB in PXL_Kernel_Axioms.v. Not a standalone provable theorem.

sections.title: A6 (Law Grounding) ‚Äî ELIMINATED
sections.txt_claim: A6 (Law Grounding): Derivable from bridging principles
sections.notes: Was axiom in Phase 1/2, now eliminated. Derivable from combination of bridging principles (modus_groundens, triune_dependency_substitution, etc.). Not a standalone theorem.

sections.title: Structural Laws ‚Äî ELIMINATED
sections.txt_claim: Structural laws (reflexivity, symmetry, transitivity, commutativity): All proven as lemmas
sections.coq_definition: Lemma ax_ident_refl : ...; Lemma ax_ident_symm : ...; Lemma ax_ident_trans : ...; Lemma ax_inter_comm : ...
sections.notes: Were axioms in Phase 1, now all proven as lemmas in PXL_Derivations_Phase2.v. Eliminated structural axioms.

sections.title: Modal Axioms ‚Äî ELIMINATED
sections.txt_claim: Modal axioms (K, T, Nec): Now semantic frame conditions, not arbitrary axioms
sections.notes: Modal axioms K, T, Nec were standalone axioms in Phase 1. Now grounded as semantic conditions of S5 Kripke frame (reflexive, symmetric, transitive). Eliminated as arbitrary postulates.
